title: MCP Tool Converter
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) converter that uses external tools for content conversion. Allows integration with custom conversion tools through the MCP interface.

id.title: MCP Server ID
id.description: Identifier of the MCP server to use for conversion.

tool.title: Tool Name
tool.description: Name of the MCP tool to invoke for conversion.

arguments_mapping.title: Arguments Mapping
arguments_mapping.description: Mapping of conversion parameters to MCP tool arguments.

file_path.title: File Path Argument
file_path.description: MCP tool argument name for the input file path.

content.title: Content Argument
content.description: MCP tool argument name for file content.

format.title: Format Argument
format.description: MCP tool argument name for output format specification.

options.title: Options Argument
options.description: MCP tool argument name for additional options.

result_mapping.title: Result Mapping
result_mapping.description: Mapping of MCP tool response fields to conversion results.

content.title: Content Field

notification_mapping.title: Notification Mapping
notification_mapping.description: Mapping for MCP notification handling during conversion.

progress.title: Progress Notification
progress.description: Notification type for conversion progress updates.
